text:
Kyle Richards & Mauricio Umansky Had ‘Things Going on’ Prior to Separation, Co-Star Says

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky’s separation came after the two had been struggling in their marriage.The “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” star hasn’t been too forthcoming with information about the challenges that she and Umansky have faced over the past year or so, but her co-star has offered some additional insight.“It’s hard.
